data.description:
An arcade Kart racing game focusing in combat and the use of individual skill of each driver.
In a Galaxy full of crazy racers an amazing championship decides who is the best driver of all!
Not only the racers can get weapons in the tracks, each one of them have individual skills! ðŸš€

Experience the ultimate space racing adventure with these features:
â€¢ 18 Unique Courses
â€¢ 6 Tournaments
â€¢ 9 Characters (each one has its own UNIQUE skill)
â€¢ 9 Power Ups
â€¢ 4 Levels of Difficulties (Easy, Normal, Hard and Challenge)

Engage in thrilling multiplayer action:
â€¢ 6 Players' Multiplayer Mode
â€¢ Voice Chat

Immerse yourself in a Kart game where each one of the powerups can be grabbed and used by the movements of your HANDS!

Gear up, strap in, and prepare for the ultimate VR racing experience with Galaxy Kart VR. Whether you're a seasoned racer or a newcomer to the genre, get ready to embark on an unforgettable journey through the cosmos where victory awaits at every turn!

changelog.change_log: Fixed fade problem for server in MP.

Optimization
Fire particle fixed.
New PSO Caching

Update 1.16
Three New Maps!
Big Top
Valhalla Valley
Pirate's Treasure

New Game Mode! Galaxy Tournament!
Play for points through 3 consecutive tracks to win!
Six Different Galaxy Tournaments:
Condor
Andromeda
Cygnus
Centauro
Sombrero
RedShift

New UI
Better UI for During End of Race
Brand New UI for Tournament Mode

Music Rework
New music for some older tracks
Now the music gets faster during the last lap

Bug Fixes
Reworked voice chat for better stability

New 3 levels.
Several other minor updates

Fixed loading screen
Improved performance in some levels
Fixed Multiplayer
